name: Harv&West
description:
Grab a friend and start the vegetawar!

Harv & West is a local multiplayer game where you have to sow vegetables. When mature, you can either put your vegetables in the bin to score points or throw them to your opponent.

Made in 48h for the Ludum Dare 52 by :

Romain Colnot

Jean-Marc Dananché

Marine Espinasse

Antoine Incorvaia

Chloé Stawski

Clément Vayer

/!\ Playable with two Xbox controllers or with an AZERTY keyboard /!\
